CustomField.description: Enabling this field would require the constituent to have an active ucinn_ascendv2__Society_Membership__c record with a ucinn_ascendv2__Giving_Society__r.nd_Division_Code__c that matches with the Hard and Soft Credit record's nd_Allocation_Division_Code__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enabling this field would require the constituent to have an active ucinn_ascendv2__Society_Membership__c record with a ucinn_ascendv2__Giving_Society__r.nd_Division_Code__c that matches with the Hard and Soft Credit record's nd_Allocation_Division_Code__c
CustomField.label: Match Membership Division Code
